testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Read what our satisfied customers have to say

review1.name: Pierre Dubois
review1.text: Excellent service! They fixed my wine cellar cooling system in no time. Very professional and knowledgeable technicians.

review2.name: Marie Laurent
review2.text: I've been using Profroid for annual maintenance for 5 years. Always reliable, professional, and they take great care of my wine collection.

review3.name: Jean-François Martin
review3.text: Quick response to my emergency call. The technician was courteous and fixed the humidity control issue efficiently.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We've got answers. Find what you need below.

q1.question: Do you offer emergency repair services?
q1.answer: We offer 24/7 emergency services for critical wine cellar issues. Our technicians typically arrive within 2-4 hours for emergency calls in the greater Montreal area.

q2.question: What types of wine cellar systems do you service?
q2.answer: We service all major brands and types of wine cellar cooling systems, including split systems, ducted systems, and through-the-wall units. Our technicians are certified to work on brands like EuroCave, WhisperKOOL, CellarPro, and more.

q3.question: How often should I have my wine cellar serviced?
q3.answer: We recommend professional maintenance at least twice a year - before summer and winter seasons. Regular maintenance helps prevent unexpected breakdowns and extends the life of your cooling system.

q4.question: What areas do you serve?
q4.answer: We serve the greater Montreal area, including Laval, Longueuil, the North Shore, and the South Shore. Contact us to check if we service your specific location.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about Profroid and our mission to provide exceptional service
about.ourStory: Our Story: Two Decades of Excellence
about.experienceText: For over 20 years, Profroid has been the trusted name in refrigeration and wine cellar services across Quebec. Our journey began with a simple commitment: to deliver unparalleled quality and reliability to every customer. Through two decades of dedicated service, our dynamic team has built a reputation for excellence, combining traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology. Every project we undertake reflects the experience and expertise gained from thousands of successful installations and repairs.
about.missionText: At Profroid, we are committed to delivering reliable and professional refrigeration and wine cellar services to residential and commercial clients. Our team of experienced technicians is dedicated to ensuring your comfort and satisfaction with every project.
about.value1Text: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our work, from initial consultation to final installation. Our 20+ years of experience ensures top-quality results every time.
about.value2Text: You can depend on us to deliver quality service on time, every time. Our track record speaks for itself with thousands of satisfied customers.
about.value3Text: We stay up-to-date with the latest technology and techniques in refrigeration and wine cellar systems, continuously evolving to serve you better.
about.value4Text: Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we go above and beyond to exceed expectations. We treat every customer like family.
about.teamText: Our team is the heart of Profroid. With over 20 years of combined expertise, our certified professionals bring unmatched skill and passion to every job. We've built a culture of continuous learning and excellence, ensuring our team stays at the forefront of industry innovations.
about.teamHighlight1: Fully certified and licensed technicians with specialized training
about.teamHighlight2: Ongoing professional development and industry certification updates
about.teamHighlight3: Friendly, respectful, and customer-focused service approach
about.feature1: Emergency service availability - we're here when you need us
about.feature2: 20+ years of proven expertise and thousands of successful projects
about.feature3: Certified and experienced technicians you can trust
about.feature4: Competitive pricing and transparent quotes with no hidden fees
about.feature5: Fast and efficient service without compromising quality
about.feature6: Comprehensive warranty on all work for your peace of mind
about.ctaTitle: Ready to Experience the Profroid Difference?
about.ctaText: Join thousands of satisfied customers who have trusted us for over 20 years. Let our experienced team take care of all your refrigeration and wine cellar needs.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your Privacy is Our Priority - Learn How Profroid Protects Your Personal Information
privacy.introText: Profroid Inc. operates the profroid.com website and service booking platform (the 'Service'). Profroid is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency about how personal information is collected, used, stored, and protected. This Privacy Policy explains Profroid's practices in accordance with Quebec's Law 25 (An Act respecting the protection of personal information in the private sector) and Canadian privacy legislation.
privacy.introHighlight: At Profroid, privacy is not just a policy - it is a fundamental commitment. Profroid understands that sharing personal information requires trust, and Profroid takes that responsibility seriously.
privacy.section1Text: Profroid collects personal information for specific, legitimate business purposes to provide professional wine cellar repair and maintenance services. Profroid only collects information that is necessary and relevant to serving your needs.
privacy.whyWeCollectText: The information Profroid collects enables service appointment scheduling, accurate quotations, repair execution, payment processing, service quality follow-up, and compliance with applicable laws and regulations in Quebec.
privacy.section2Text: Profroid collects various categories of personal information depending on your interaction with the platform. Here is a detailed breakdown of what data Profroid collects and why:
privacy.category1Explanation: Profroid collects this information to identify you as a customer, communicate service updates, send appointment confirmations, and allow technicians to contact you regarding your service.
privacy.category2Item3: Specific location details of your wine cellar or cooling system
privacy.category2Explanation: Profroid uses address information to schedule technician visits, provide accurate service quotes based on location, organize service routes, and comply with service area requirements in Quebec.
privacy.category3Item1: Details about your wine cellar system (size, type, brand, current issues)
privacy.category3Item3: Photos or documentation of your system (if provided for diagnosis)
privacy.category3Explanation: This information is essential for Profroid technicians to provide accurate diagnoses, prepare appropriate quotes, track service history, and ensure consistent and quality service delivery.
privacy.category4Item1: Credit card or payment method details
privacy.category4Explanation: Payment information is collected to process service charges and issue invoices. Profroid uses Stripe, a secure third-party payment processor, to handle all payment transactions. Your payment details are encrypted and never stored on Profroid's servers - Stripe manages payment processing with industry-leading security standards.
privacy.category5Item2: Subscription to service reminders and maintenance tips
privacy.category5Explanation: Profroid collects this information to communicate with you in your preferred way and to improve services based on your feedback.
privacy.section3Text: Your personal information is used for the following specific purposes:
privacy.usage1Text: Contact information and address details are used to schedule service appointments, send appointment reminders, dispatch technicians, and provide service updates.
privacy.usage2Text: Details about your wine cellar system, location, and service requirements are used to prepare accurate quotes and communicate service options.
privacy.usage3Text: Profroid uses your information to follow up on service quality, address concerns, provide technical support, and ensure you receive the service level expected from Profroid.
privacy.usage4Text: Payment information is processed exclusively through Stripe, Profroid's secure payment partner. Stripe handles payment processing, maintains financial records, and coordinates refunds if necessary. Profroid maintains transaction records for billing and accounting purposes only.
privacy.usage5Text: Profroid analyzes aggregated and anonymized data to identify trends, improve service offerings, optimize appointment scheduling, and develop new services that meet customer needs.
privacy.section4Text: Profroid implements comprehensive security measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Profroid's commitment to data security includes:
privacy.securityMeasure1: Encrypted data transmission using HTTPS protocol for all website and application communications
privacy.securityMeasure2: Secure database storage with role-based access controls limiting employee access to customer data
privacy.securityMeasure3: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments conducted by third-party security specialists
privacy.securityMeasure4: Staff training on data protection and privacy best practices to ensure proper handling of customer information
privacy.securityWarning: Stripe, Profroid's payment processor, maintains PCI DSS compliance and industry-leading encryption standards to protect payment information.
privacy.section5Title: Your Rights Regarding Your Personal Data
privacy.section5Text: Under Quebec's Law 25 and Canadian privacy legislation, you have the following rights concerning your personal information:
privacy.right1Text: You have the right to request and receive a copy of all personal information Profroid holds about you. This allows you to verify the accuracy of the information and understand how Profroid is using it.
privacy.right2Text: If you believe any of your personal information is inaccurate, incomplete, or outdated, you may request correction. Profroid will update your information promptly.
privacy.right3Text: You may request deletion of your personal information, subject to certain legal and business exceptions. Profroid will honor deletion requests unless the data must be retained for legal compliance, warranty purposes, or to complete pending transactions.
privacy.right4Text: If you have provided consent for specific uses of your data (such as marketing communications), you may withdraw that consent at any time. This will not affect the lawfulness of processing that occurred before you withdrew consent.
privacy.right5Text: You may request that Profroid provide your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format so you can transfer it to another service provider if desired.
privacy.section6Text: Profroid may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in practices, technological improvements, legal requirements, or other factors. When material changes are made, Profroid will notify you by email or by posting a prominent notice on the website.
privacy.section6TextAdditional: Your continued use of the Service following notification of changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy. Profroid encourages you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how your information is protected.
privacy.section7Text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, wish to exercise any of your privacy rights, or have concerns about privacy practices, please contact Profroid using the information below. Profroid is committed to addressing your privacy concerns promptly.
privacy.governingLawText: This Privacy Policy is governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Quebec, Canada, specifically including Law 25 (An Act respecting the protection of personal information in the private sector). Any disputes arising from this policy shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Quebec. Profroid's failure to enforce any right or provision of this policy does not constitute a waiver of those rights. If any provision is deemed invalid by a court, the remaining provisions shall remain in full effect.
privacy.lastUpdated: Last Updated: February 2026. Effective Date: February 1, 2026

warranty.title: Warranty Policy
warranty.subtitle: Your Satisfaction is Our Priority - Understand Your Warranty Coverage
warranty.overviewText: At Profroid, we stand behind the quality of our work and products. Our comprehensive warranty ensures that your wine cellar cooling system and all related services are covered against defects in materials and workmanship.
warranty.overviewHighlight: We are committed to providing you with peace of mind. If something goes wrong, we're here to make it right.
warranty.coverageText: Our warranty covers a wide range of components and services to ensure your wine cellar operates flawlessly:
warranty.coverage1Text: All compressors, condensers, evaporators, and cooling fans installed by Profroid are covered for defects in materials and workmanship.
warranty.coverage2Text: Wiring, control panels, sensors, and electrical connections installed during our service are fully warranted.
warranty.coverage3Text: Our professional installation and repair work is guaranteed. If an issue arises from our workmanship, we'll fix it at no charge.
warranty.coverage4Text: All genuine parts and materials supplied by Profroid come with manufacturer warranties, which we honor and facilitate.
warranty.durationText: Profroid provides comprehensive warranty coverage on all services and products with a maximum duration of 2 years:
warranty.durationDetail1: Labor Warranty: 1 year from the date of service completion
warranty.durationDetail2: Parts Warranty: Up to 2 years depending on the component
warranty.durationDetail3: Complete System Installation: 2 years comprehensive coverage from installation date
warranty.exclusionsText: To maintain the integrity of your warranty, please note the following exclusions:
warranty.exclusion1: Damage caused by improper use, abuse, or neglect of the equipment
warranty.exclusion2: Modifications or repairs performed by non-authorized technicians
warranty.exclusion3: Normal wear and tear from regular use over time
warranty.exclusion4: Damage from power surges, lightning, or electrical issues not caused by our installation
warranty.exclusion5: Failure to perform recommended maintenance as outlined in your service agreement
warranty.claimProcessTitle: How to File a Warranty Claim
warranty.claimProcessText: We've made the warranty claim process simple and straightforward:
warranty.step1Text: Fill out the warranty claim form below with details about the issue you're experiencing.
warranty.step2Text: Our team will review your claim within 24-48 hours and contact you via your preferred method (email or phone).
warranty.step3Text: If needed, we'll schedule a technician visit to assess the issue and determine warranty coverage.
warranty.step4Text: Once approved, we'll repair or replace the defective components at no cost to you under warranty terms.
warranty.contactText: Have questions about your warranty coverage? Contact Profroid Inc. and our team will assist you:

form.title: File a Warranty Claim
form.subtitle: Please provide detailed information about the issue you're experiencing with your wine cellar system.
form.name: Full Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe the issue in detail, including when it started, any error messages, and what troubleshooting steps you've already tried...
form.successMessage: Thank you for submitting your warranty claim. Our team will review it and contact you within 24-48 hours via your preferred contact method.
